trans-unit.source: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.
trans-unit.target: Определяет необязательный контракт, который можно реализовать в привязке, чтобы указать ли входящие запросы синхронно или асинхронно обрабатываются службой.

trans-unit.source: In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: В некоторых случаях может быть более эффективным для привязки для обработки сообщений с помощью синхронного <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>или <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>методы.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> class can optionally implement IBindingRuntimePreferences to indicate to callers that this is preferred.
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>класса можно при необходимости реализовать IBindingRuntimePreferences, указывающий вызывающим объектам, что этот метод является предпочтительным.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If a binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods.
trans-unit.target: Если привязка не реализует IBindingRuntimePreferences, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] уровень модели служб по умолчанию использует асинхронные версии `Receive` и `Request` методы.

trans-unit.source: If a binding does implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) or the asynchronous versions (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: Если привязка реализует IBindingRuntimePreferences, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] уровень модели служб проверяет значение <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>и использует, чтобы определить, следует ли вызывать синхронные версии этих методов (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> или <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) или асинхронные (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> и <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>или <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>до <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IBindingRuntimePreferences is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods to receive messages from the channel.
trans-unit.target: Если IBindingRuntimePreferences, реализованных привязкой и возвращает `true` из <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>свойство, рекомендуется использовать синхронные <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>и <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>для получения сообщений из канала.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences or returns `false` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: Если привязка не реализует IBindingRuntimePreferences или возвращает `false` из <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>свойство, рекомендуется использовать асинхронную <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A>и <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>или <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>и <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>методы.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented.
trans-unit.target: Независимо от значения, возвращенного <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>Свойства всех привязках должны быть надлежащим образом реализованы как синхронные и асинхронные версии `Receive` методы для реализуемых конкретных типов каналов.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения о реализации пользовательских каналов см. в разделе [разработка каналов](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает значение, указывающее, возможна ли обработка входящих запросов, более эффективно синхронно или асинхронно.

trans-unit.source: The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously.
trans-unit.target: В стандартных (системных) привязках, предоставляемых по [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] этот интерфейс реализован и в некоторых случаях переопределить значение по умолчанию, чтобы использовалась синхронная обработка входящих сообщений.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Если запросы, которые могут обрабатываться более эффективно синхронно. в противном случае<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to handle requests asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Значение по умолчанию — <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, асинхронная обработка запросов.
